description: When seven women get struck by lightning, they'll find out fate isn't what they thought and now they will all turn into different paranormal creatures. Angels, leprechauns, pixies, brownies, djinn, dragons, bears shifters, and many others will come together when the magic of their blood is revealed. Humans aren't as alone as they choose to believe. Every human possesses a trait of supernatural that lays dormant within their genetic make-up. Centuries of diluting and breeding have allowed humans to think they are alone and untouched by magic. But what happens when something changes?
title: Dante's Circle,

description: Completed with 13 Volumes. Written & illustrated by Wakoh Honna.Kido Tatsuhiko moved to Tokyo to attend an art school and start his new life. In his new room, there's a small hole in the wall. At first he can see nothing through the small hole, but one night, through the peeping hole, he saw a girl. That's how his new life starts. Associated Names: nozokiana Tou Kui Kong yeosbogigumeong Heimliche Blicke Nozokiana Peeping Hole
title: Nozoki Ana

description: After his master (Goomonryong) destroys his ki-center, Shioon leaves the world of the Murim for a normal life to which he believes his master was trying to return him. But for a boy who holds the Phoenix medallion of the Sunwoo clan and the knowledge of the Black Heaven & Earth Technique, the world of the Murim will come to him... Continuation of series with new allies and enemies.
title: The Breaker New Waves

note:
According to Asimov, The Complete Robot was the first book in the series, although it did include all the stories in the earlier I, Robot and The Rest of the Robots. 
    Therefore the earlier collections might be considered precursors for the entire series.
    
    The remaining short story collections and The Positronic Man chronologically fall between The Complete Robot and the The Caves of Steel.
    One could also argue that the Tiedemann/Irvine Robot Mystery series as well as Allen's Caliban series belong in the series.
description: Part of the This series of short stories and novels featuring positronic robots are set in the first age of positronic robotics and space exploration. The unique feature of Asimov's robots are the Three Laws of Robotics, hardwired in a robot's positronic brain, which all robots in his fiction must obey, and which ensure that the robot does not turn against its creators.
title: Robot

description: From days of nursery fires, mustard plasters, codliver oil, cops on horseback, and red nail polish meant too much vanity. Melendy children know their vocations. Mona, 13, actress-to-be, recites poetry and Shakespeare at the drop of a hat. Engineer Rush, 12, builds Meccano bridges. Miranda, 10, dances and paints pictures. Oliver, 6, calm and thoughtful, is a train engineer. Father is a writer. Beloved housekeeper Cuffy takes on the motherly role. #1 explores New York City, #2 the country. http://us.macmillan.com/series/TheMelendyQuartet
title: The Melendy Family

description: Series of adventure novels featuring Captain Rawson spy, linguist, sportsman, duellist, ladies man and career soldier involved in the campaigns of the Duke of Marlborough during the war of the Spanish Succession.
title: Captain Rawson

description: In the ordinary world, forces are at work which keep the balance of the universe in order. Enter the Sinclairs, higher demons with a mission--to sway those souls on the brink of Decision, to push them toward heaven or toward hell, as they are meant to go. But an amusing prank has unintended results. Now debts must be paid to those who've been wronged, be they dragon, demon, angel... or worse.
title: Ethereal Foes

description: This is the series in publication order. In an "Introduction" of his last novel, Le Docteur Pascal, Zola gave a recommended reading order, although it is not required, as each novel stands on its own. You can find Zola's recommended order here: 
title: Les Rougon-Macquart

description: In his last Rougon-Macquart novel, Le Docteur Pascal, Zola gave a recommended reading order, although it is not required, as each novel stands on its own. You can find the series in publication order here: Note: This recommend reading order isn't mentioned in the most authoritative French editions. However, in the fifth chapter of Le Docteur Pascalthe Docteur Pascal summarizes all the Rougon Macquart history and the English journalist Ernest Alfred Vizetelly derived a recommended reading order from it, affirming that it was Zola's recommended reading order. Les Rougon-Macquart may be read in any reading order anyway, as long as you start the reading with La Fortune des Rougonand end it with Le Docteur Pascal. Although most of the novels stand on their own, it would be better to read L'Assommoirbefore reading Nana, and to read Pot-Bouillebefore reading The Ladies Paradise.
title: Les Rougon-Macquart (recommended reading order)

description: Tarzan is the son of a British Lord and Lady who were marooned on the West coast of Africa by mutineers. When Tarzan was a year old, his mother died of natural causes, and his father was killed by Kerchak, leader of the ape tribe into which Tarzan was adopted.
title: Tarzan

description: The works of Edgar Rice Burroughs that take place in the same universe, in an approximate chronological order based largely on Philip Jose Farmer and Win Scott Eckert's Burroughs timeline.
title: Burroughs Universe

description: Lee McKinney, a divorcee who returns to Michigan to work for her aunt's chocolate business, in the Chocaholic mysteries:
title: A Chocoholic Mystery

note: GR generally goes with the author's official series name (Will Trent); they are the same books, they should not have two different series with 100% overlap. GR usually uses the most up-to-date name for a series which is not "Georgia".
description: The Will Trent series takes place in Atlanta and features GBI special agent Will Trent, his partner Faith Mitchell, and Angie Polaski. The first two books in the series are Triptych and Fractured. Later, Sara Linton from The Grant County Series joins the series, and also appears in Undone, Broken, Fallen, Snatched (a novella), and Criminal.
title: Will Trent

note: Up From the Grave, book 7, will be the last book in the Night Huntress series as you can read on Jeaniene Frosts' site: http://jeanienefrost.com/2013/08/the-grave-stops-here/
description: Author recommended reading order:There is a specific reading order for the Night Huntress series, including all other Night Huntress World series books, and some novellas. If you do not read them in the Author's suggested reading order (below), other than 'Reckoning', the books will not make sense, or you will read spoilers. The author's recommended reading order is: RECKONING (eBook prequel novella set in Bones's point of view before he meets Cat*) though I would recommend reading this after Book 1 so that you know the characters...HALFWAY TO THE GRAVE (Book 1: Night Huntress Series) HAPPILY NEVER AFTER (eBook novella*) ONE FOOT IN THE GRAVE (Book 2: Night Huntress Series) AT GRAVE'S END (Book 3: Night Huntress Series) DEVIL TO PAY (eBook novella*) DESTINED FOR AN EARLY GRAVE (Book 4: Night Huntress Series) MAGIC GRAVES (eBook anthology featuring a Cat and Bones story*) FIRST DROP OF CRIMSON (Night Huntress World novel) ETERNAL KISS OF DARKNESS Night Huntress World novel) THIS SIDE OF THE GRAVE (Book 5: Night Huntress Series) ONE GRAVE AT A TIME (Book 6: Night Huntress Series) THE BITE BEFORE CHRISTMAS (contains a long Cat and Bones novella, "Home for the Holidays") ONCE BURNED (Book 1: Night Prince Series) TWICE TEMPTED (Book 2: Night Prince Series) UP FROM THE GRAVE (Book 7: Night Huntress Series) BOUND BY FLAMES (Book 3: Night Prince Series) See link: 
title: Night Huntress

description: Paranormal romance. This is a complete list with the Night Huntress, Night Huntress World and the Night Prince series in correct reading order. All series contain spoilers for each other, so it's recommended to read all the books in order of publication. http://jeanienefrost.com/reading-order/ *Night Huntress*Night Huntress World*Night Prince
title: Night Huntress Universe
